price: 5. Kaadu anu diggah yot xayi marak anu rabeek gamadal ku-diini baysaah usun nummâ sooloh kaal sole waanamak meesitak, kaadu yi- barra maxalaytoh tanik ku-xaquk yoo nagraah yoo cata baxa yoh acuy iyye.
arabic: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī khif'tu al-mawāliya min warāī wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyan
